metadata.title: AliasVault
metadata.description: AliasVault is an open-source end-to-end encrypted password and alias manager.

hero.title: Privacy-First Password & Email Alias Manager
hero.description: AliasVault is an end-to-end encrypted password and (email) alias manager that protects your privacy by creating alternative identities, passwords and email addresses for every website you use.

footer.description: AliasVault is a privacy-first, open-source, end-to-end encrypted password and (email) alias manager that protects your privacy.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: What makes AliasVault unique
features.description: AliasVault provides comprehensive privacy protection through innovative features designed to keep your digital identity secure.

about.title: About AliasVault
about.subtitle: Privacy-first password management
about.description: Learn more about our mission to provide secure, private password and alias management.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch
contact.description: Have questions or need support? We're here to help.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Latest news and updates
blog.description: Stay up to date with the latest AliasVault news, updates, and privacy insights.

platforms.title: Platforms
platforms.subtitle: Available everywhere
platforms.description: AliasVault is available on all major platforms and browsers.
